title: Fragment, late 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of tan silk uncut velvet on a ground tan silk shot through with metallic threads. Design of formalized tiny branches with blossoms, alternating horizontal rows turning left and right.

Fragment, late 16th century.
late 16th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
